name: NSLocale.LanguageDirection
desc: The directions that a language may take across a page of text.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The direction of the language is unknown.

items.name: case leftToRight
items.desc: The language direction is from left to right.

items.name: case rightToLeft
items.desc: The language direction is from right to left.

items.name: case topToBottom
items.desc: The language direction is from top to bottom.

items.name: case bottomToTop
items.desc: The language direction is from bottom to top.
